thread.section_title: Passy Eiffel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Long Weekend in Paris
thread.title_full: Long Weekend in Paris - Review of Passy Eiffel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Fergal H
title: Long Weekend in Paris
text:
Hotel was wonderfully central - 10 minutes walk to the Eiffel Tower, 5 minutes walk to the Trocadero, 20 minutes walk to the Arc de Triomph. Hotel was spotlessly clean - staff were very helpful.
Rooms were a bit small (but considering the hotels location and star rating - that was a little understandable. Breakfast was a bit expensive for what was on offer - all in all a great experience.
